banner.title: Risma Dance Community
banner.description: Explore the vibrant world of dance with Risma Dance Community! Our website offers easy event registration, connecting passionate dancers to exciting dance experiences.

story.title: risma story
description: Risma Yulana is a dance enthusiast with a remarkable journey in Indonesia's dance scene. She's the driving force behind Risma Dance Community (RDC), where her passion for dance comes to life. As an Ambassador for the United Country Western Dance Council (UCWDC) in Indonesia, Risma proudly represents her country on the global stage. She also wears the hat of Event Director for the Indonesia Open International Line Dance Competition, showcasing her organizational skills. With UCWDC certification as a Line Dance Instructor, she's a go-to source for those eager to learn this dance style. Risma is a creative choreographer for international line dance competitions too, making her a prominent figure in the dance world.

Risma Yulana's dance journey is both inspiring and diverse. She's not only an ambassador and instructor but also a hands-on organizer and choreographer. Her role as a UCWDC Ambassador means she's a cultural bridge, representing Indonesia's dance community globally. Her work as Event Director for the Indonesia Open International Line Dance Competition underscores her commitment to fostering a sense of unity and competition. Whether she's teaching, creating captivating dance moves, or representing her country, Risma's influence on the international dance stage is undeniable, inspiring many to embrace the joy of line dancing.
